37 #include <elion_planner/threadsafe_state_storage.h>
38 
39 elion::TSStateStorage::TSStateStorage(robot_model::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) : start_state_(robot_model)
40 {
41  start_state_.setToDefaultValues();
42 }
43 
44 elion::TSStateStorage::TSStateStorage(const moveit::core::RobotState& start_state) : start_state_(start_state)
45 {
46 }
47 
48 elion::TSStateStorage::~TSStateStorage()
49 {
50  for (auto& thread_state : thread_states_)
51  delete thread_state.second;
52 }
53 
54 moveit::core::RobotState* elion::TSStateStorage::getStateStorage() const
55 {
56  moveit::core::RobotState* st = nullptr;
57  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> slock(lock_);
58  std::map<std::thread::id, moveit::core::RobotState*>::const_iterator it =
59  thread_states_.find(std::this_thread::get_id());
60  if (it == thread_states_.end())
61  {
62  st = new moveit::core::RobotState(start_state_);
63  thread_states_[std::this_thread::get_id()] = st;
64  }
65  else
66  st = it->second;
67  return st;
68 }
